reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for fall and winter wear, describing it as a form-fitting, comfortable, and super soft piece that fits true to size. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect with tights and boots, others say it's a bit shorter than expected. The material quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising the fabric while others note it's not what they expected, describing it as polyester rather than sweater material. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and soft!
items.body: Most comfortable dress I have ever owned! Color/pattern is very bright and cute! Size is true to your normal size! I'm 5'3 and weigh 125 pounds. A size XS fits perfectly! Quality of material is great! Super stretchy and soft! Read more
items.author: Melissa Wilkinson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfy, beautiful
items.body: I love this sweater dress! The color is gorgeous and unique, the material is soft and the fit is perfect and comfortable. I’m going to buy another in a different color, I love it so much! Read more
items.author: Jess P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size!!!
items.body: True to size. I’m 5’8, 210 pounds and I ordered a Large it fit like a glove but is a little too short for the event I’m attending. I love it so much that I decided to keep this one and u just ordered another one in XL so hopefully it won’t be too big and it will be a little longer!!! It’s extremely cute and fitted. Good quality and looks like the picture!!! I’m usually not a fan of clothes from Amazon but definitely worth the money!!!! It does have stretch to it!!! UPDATE- I received the XL and it’s too big and not any longer haha it looks worse actually so I’ll be returning and just keeping the original L that I ordered. Read more
items.author: Josie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute but not for me
items.body: baggy on me, thick material. cute but not for me Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 recommend!!
items.body: love it! if you have any sensory issues this is the perfect fabric, i’ve literally had people pet my arm and compliment how soft it feels. it washes easily, the length is comfortable and lands about mid thigh on me (5’3” size S), though I like to layer a long skirt over it for a more comfortable option. looks exactly like the picture! obsessed with the sleeves/cuffs. i legit bought a second one so i can rotate which one i wear while the other goes through the laundry. Read more
items.author: Morgan Mickle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
items.body: I feel like I write nothing, but bad reviews now here. But they're honest. I used to buy ALL clothes from Amazon bc I hate clothes shopping. I don't have time or patience. But this whole year (2025) all I've gotten is crap. Cheap crap. The same crap u get from Shein or Temu just more expensive. I guess it's all the same bc u get free shipping with Amazon. Shein and Temu is cheaper clothes but u pay shipping. Either way it's all the same cheap silky shiny feeling clothes. This dress could have been cute, but they decided to make the sleeves at the wrist big & puffy Read more
items.author: Kshe Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: I absolutely LOVED this dress. I wished I would have had a black belt to go around me but I used a long necklace instead. I wore this for our family christmas pictures and I was not disappointed. It is sewn to fit close around the waist instead of just being a straight dress. The baggy sleeve bottoms add a nice touch for style. It came with some wrinkles but they quickly came out because of the stretchy material. The color was true to the image and it is definitely high quality. It is warm and versatile making this the perfect dress for any winter event. Read more
items.author: Savannah Marie Scott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, amazing fitting dress
items.body: I love this dress. I will buy it in more colors. The dress is form fitting but the high neck line and the loose sleeves make it appropriate to wear without looking like you are going to a club. The material is soft and warm. It was very comfortable. The length was perfect on me. I am short and it's hard to find dresses that aren't too long. This hit about mid thigh. I would highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Jia J

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Cream, Khaki Plaid, Apricot, Black, Red, Pink, White, Red Plaid, Black Plaid, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
